about_the_game:
Defend your kingdom and conquer the lands of your enemies!



From the magical portals comes a horde of enemies. Orcs, undead, and brigands want to tear apart your kingdom piece by piece.

You have several different biomes (floors) to defend simultaneously, hire fighters for defense, to build towers, turrets, traps and various modules for reliable protection. Use their abilities and skills, and create your own tactics to successfully push back the enemy's army.

Gameplay:
  • You can play offline anywhere in the world;
  • Convenient and simple controls, easy to understand and start playing right off. Have fun and get stronger;
  • Unite into clans to crush the enemy – interact with each other;
  • Grow your kingdom and improve your defenses. Invent your own tactics, use different skills and abilities;
  • Offense is the best defense. Seize enemy lands, replenishing your supplies.

Variety:
  • Hundreds of different waves, each one unique, making you feel like a new game with different mechanics;
  • Different modes, capturing castles and other lands, defending caravans, raiding resource islands;
  • Different types and classes of enemies. No time to be bored: everyone needs a different approach;
  • A wide variety of worlds-biomes to defend. From winter mountains to warm seashores: each location is unique and exciting;
  • Each level is a unique biome with its own strong abilities for defense;
  • Mages, knights, archers, dragons, towers, defense towers, defense modules – collect them all!
Fight back your enemies on all levels. Build an impregnable fortress.
